name: Idiot Proof Dark !Map Fix!
description: Fixed Jacob Hanson's Wunderground Dark Idiot Proof style having had inverted maps since Wunderground changed something back in fall 2017. Tried to re-invert a couple other elements just for ease of information at a glance.
additional_info:
Please do not hesitate to let me know if anything should be changed. I am still learning CSS and wouldn't be surprised if something is broken or becomes broken in a future build of Wunderground's site.

5/23/2020 - Site updates mean new inversions. It's not perfect but it works.
